title: Meet the Filmmakers: Meet the Press Film Festival with AFI
description: Missed the Meet the Press Film Festival with AFI? Meet three of the filmmakers behind the inaugural event, and watch a special digital showcase at nbcnews.com/mtpfilm, download the NBC News app on Roku or Apple TV, or search the on-demand player in your set top cable box.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
